", "answer": "The scheme \u201cScheme for Promoting Young Talents in Science-I (SPYTiS-I)\u201d is constituted for the purpose of providing financial and technical assistance to talented young students who have innovative ideas in scientific/technological pursuits. Under the scheme, students from schools will be selected every year to do a science project, and selected students will be provided financial support for successfully completing the project.

"}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "Note 05:", "bold": true}, {"text": " The Head of the Institution shall ensure that the number of proposals being forwarded from the institution is as per the criteria given above, failing which none of the proposals from the institution will be considered. "}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "Note 06:", "bold": true}, {"text": " The financial assistance will be disbursed to the Head of the Institution, only after the successful conduct of the project, subject to the submission of signed terms and conditions, final report, and financial statements. The audited Statement of Expenditure (SE) and Utilization Certificate (UC) in the standard format may be submitted within three months after the completion of the project.
